name: nova
description: NOVA - Assistant IA pour le développement logiciel

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && echo "✅ All dependencies installed successfully!"
scripts.audit:all:
echo "🔍 Running Security Audit..." && echo "
📦 Root level:" && npm audit && echo "
🖥️ Backend:" && cd backend && npm audit && cd .. && echo "
🎨 Frontend:" && cd frontend && npm audit && cd .. && echo "
✅ Audit complete!"
scripts.dev:front: cd frontend && SET PORT=3000 && npm start
scripts.dev:back: cd backend && SET PORT=5000 && npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run test:back && npm run test:front
